BaseTemplate.description: Simple rental property management for property owners
BaseTemplate.made_with: Made with <author></author> by the RentTrackr team.

Index.meta_title: RentTrackr - Simple Rental Property Management for Property Owners
Index.meta_description: Manage your rental properties with ease. Track rent, maintenance, tenants, and payments all in one simple place. Built for property owners who value simplicity.
Index.hero_title: Managing Your Rental Properties Made Simple
Index.hero_subtitle: Keep track of rent payments, maintenance, and tenant information all in one easy-to-use place. No complicated software—just straightforward property management.
Index.features_title: Everything You Need in One Place
Index.features_subtitle: Simple tools to help you stay organized and stress-free
Index.feature_rent_tracking_description: See who's paid and who hasn't at a glance. Set up automatic reminders so you never miss a payment.
Index.feature_maintenance_description: Keep a complete history of repairs and maintenance for each property. Know exactly what was done and when.
Index.feature_tenant_info_description: Store contact details, lease dates, and important documents safely. Find what you need in seconds.
Index.feature_reminders_description: Get notified when rent is due or when payments are late. Stay on top of your cash flow effortlessly.
Index.feature_reports_description: View clear summaries of your income and expenses. Perfect for tax time or just checking how you're doing.
Index.feature_security_description: Your information is protected with bank-level security. Only you can access your data.
Index.trust_description: RentTrackr was designed specifically for property owners who want simplicity without sacrificing functionality. No confusing menus, no technical jargon—just a straightforward way to manage your properties with confidence.
Index.footer_tagline: Simple property management for peace of mind.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.meta_title: About RentTrackr - Our Story and Mission
About.meta_description: Learn about RentTrackr's mission to help property owners manage their rentals with simplicity, clarity, and confidence.
About.about_paragraph_1: RentTrackr was created with one simple goal: to help property owners manage their rental properties without the stress and confusion that often comes with complicated software.
About.about_paragraph_2: We understand that not everyone wants to spend hours learning complex systems. That's why we built RentTrackr to be straightforward, easy to understand, and genuinely helpful for property owners of all ages and technical backgrounds.
About.about_paragraph_3: Whether you own one property or several, RentTrackr gives you the tools you need to stay organized, track important information, and manage your rentals with confidence.
About.mission_statement: To provide property owners with a simple, accessible, and reliable platform that takes the complexity out of rental property management—so you can focus on what matters most.
About.value_simplicity_description: We believe good software should be easy to use. No hidden features, no confusing menus—just clear, helpful tools that work the way you expect them to.
About.value_accessibility_description: We design with all users in mind, ensuring that text is easy to read, buttons are clearly labeled, and navigation is intuitive.
About.value_trust_description: Your data is important to us. We use industry-standard security practices to keep your information safe and private.
About.contact_text: Have questions or need help? We're here for you.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

Support.meta_description: Get help with RentTrackr. Contact our support team for assistance with your rental property management needs.
Support.title: Customer Support
Support.subtitle: We're here to help you manage your rental properties with confidence
Support.email_support_description: Send us an email and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
Support.phone_support_description: Call us for immediate assistance during business hours.
Support.faq_1_question: How do I add a new property?
Support.faq_1_answer: Go to the Properties section in your dashboard and click 'Add New Property'. Fill in the property details and save.
Support.faq_2_question: How do I track rent payments?
Support.faq_2_answer: Use the Rent Tracker section to record payments, set up automatic reminders, and view payment history.
Support.faq_3_answer: Yes, you can export your property data, tenant information, and financial reports in various formats.
Support.faq_4_answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption and security measures to protect your information.
Support.faq_5_question: How do I cancel my subscription?
Support.faq_5_answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings or contact our support team.

Terms.meta_description: Read RentTrackr's terms of service and user agreement for our rental property management platform.
Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.introduction_text: Welcome to RentTrackr. These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our rental property management platform and services.
Terms.acceptance_text: By accessing or using RentTrackr, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access the service.
Terms.service_description_text: RentTrackr provides a comprehensive platform for managing rental properties, including:
Terms.user_accounts_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
Terms.account_responsibility_2: Maintaining the security of your password
Terms.account_responsibility_3: All activities that occur under your account
Terms.subscription_text: Our service is provided on a subscription basis with the following terms:
Terms.payment_term_1: Subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis
Terms.payment_term_2: All fees are non-refundable except as required by law
Terms.payment_term_3: We may change our pricing with 30 days notice
Terms.payment_term_4: You can cancel your subscription at any time
Terms.prohibited_uses_text: You may not use our service:
Terms.prohibited_use_1: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
Terms.prohibited_use_2: To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
Terms.prohibited_use_3: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
Terms.prohibited_use_4: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
Terms.privacy_text: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the service.
Terms.liability_text: In no event shall RentTrackr, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.
Terms.termination_text: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
Terms.changes_text: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.
Terms.contact_text: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:

Privacy.meta_description: Learn how RentTrackr protects your privacy and handles your personal information in our comprehensive privacy policy.
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.introduction_text: This Privacy Policy describes how RentTrackr collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our rental property management platform.
Privacy.information_collection_text: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we obtain automatically when you use our service.
Privacy.personal_information_text: We may collect personal information such as:
Privacy.personal_info_1: Name, email address, and contact information
Privacy.technical_information_text: We automatically collect certain technical information:
Privacy.use_information_text: We use the information we collect to:
Privacy.use_purpose_1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
Privacy.use_purpose_2: Process transactions and send related information
Privacy.use_purpose_3: Send technical notices and support messages
Privacy.use_purpose_4: Respond to your comments and questions
Privacy.use_purpose_5: Monitor and analyze usage and trends
Privacy.information_sharing_text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
Privacy.third_party_services_text: We may share information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our service:
Privacy.third_party_2: Cloud service providers for data storage
Privacy.data_security_text: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information:
Privacy.security_measure_1: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
Privacy.your_rights_text: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
Privacy.right_1: Access and review your personal information
Privacy.right_3: Request deletion of your personal information
Privacy.right_4: Object to processing of your information
Privacy.cookies_text: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience:
Privacy.data_retention_text: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
Privacy.children_privacy_text: Our service is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
Privacy.changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
Privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

Cancellation.meta_description: Learn about RentTrackr's cancellation and refund policy for subscription services.
Cancellation.title: Cancellation & Refund Policy
Cancellation.introduction_text: This policy outlines the terms and conditions for canceling your RentTrackr subscription and requesting refunds.
Cancellation.cancellation_text: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period.
Cancellation.cancellation_timing_text: Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period. You will continue to have access to all features until that time.
Cancellation.refund_policy_text: We offer refunds under the following circumstances:
Cancellation.refund_condition_1: You cancel within 30 days of your initial subscription
Cancellation.refund_condition_2: You experience technical issues that prevent service use
Cancellation.refund_condition_3: We fail to deliver promised features
Cancellation.refund_condition_4: You are charged incorrectly due to our error
Cancellation.refund_step_2: Provide your account details and reason for refund
Cancellation.refund_step_3: We will review your request within 5 business days
Cancellation.refund_step_4: If approved, refunds will be processed within 10 business days
Cancellation.processing_time_text: 5-10 business days for review and approval
Cancellation.bank_processing_text: Additional 3-5 business days for bank processing
Cancellation.non_refundable_text: The following are not eligible for refunds:
Cancellation.partial_refunds_text: In some cases, we may offer partial refunds based on unused service time or specific circumstances.
Cancellation.partial_refund_note_text: Partial refunds are calculated on a pro-rated basis for the remaining subscription period.
Cancellation.chargebacks_text: If you initiate a chargeback or dispute with your bank, the following consequences apply:
Cancellation.chargeback_consequence_1: Your account may be immediately suspended
Cancellation.chargeback_consequence_2: We may dispute the chargeback with supporting documentation
Cancellation.chargeback_consequence_3: Future payment methods may be restricted
Cancellation.account_termination_text: When your subscription is canceled, the following will occur:
Cancellation.termination_effect_1: Access to premium features will be removed
Cancellation.termination_effect_2: Your data will be retained for 90 days
Cancellation.termination_effect_3: You can export your data during this period
Cancellation.reinstatement_text: You may reactivate your subscription at any time by logging into your account and updating your payment method.
Cancellation.contact_text: For questions about cancellations or refunds, contact us:
